synopsis.text: The story follows Tohru Honda, a resilient and compassionate 16-year-old girl who, after losing her mother and finding herself homeless, secretly camps out in the woods. Her life takes an unexpected turn when she stumbles upon the Sohma family's secret: some members of the family are cursed to transform into animals of the Chinese Zodiac when hugged by someone of the opposite sex. Despite the initial shock and the potential danger of her newfound knowledge, the Sohmas welcome Tohru into their home and hire her as a domestic helper. As she navigates the complexities of the Sohma family and their ancient curse, Tohru's presence brings a sense of peace and understanding to the household. With each passing day, Tohru finds herself drawn deeper into the world of the Sohmas, uncovering dark secrets and forming unbreakable bonds with the family members, particularly Yuki and Kyo. Will Tohru's kindhearted nature be enough to help the Sohmas break their curse and find happiness? Only time will tell in this heartwarming and thrilling tale.
